content.description:
The best beginners multipitch at Lightning Dome.  The second pitch starts with a bit of a runout, but the climbing is easy.

P1) From the left side of the boulder-covered approach ledge, climb the funky right facing corner and slab (3) to an au cheval move.  Head left on a small ledge system past a bush and a 2 bolt belay. 5.6 100

P2) Climb off the ledge straight up or right (right being easier), then move left to a hidden-from-below bolt after about 40.  Climb the flake/cracks above to a 2 bolt anchor. 5.6 100

P3) Continue up and left to the right-facing slanting dihedral and climb it to its top.  The belay is best positioned just above the first stunted tree. 5.5 60

P4) Scramble left to the Y shaped rappel tree.
content.location: Scramble up and right from the main gully system onto a boulder strewn ledge.
